templates.default:
üéâ Happy Birthday {{firstName}}! üéÇ

Wishing you a fantastic day filled with joy, laughter, and amazing workouts! Thank you for being such a wonderful member of our Viking Hammer family.

Have a great celebration! üí™

- Viking Hammer CrossFit Team
templates.formal:
Dear {{firstName}} {{lastName}},

On behalf of the entire Viking Hammer CrossFit team, we would like to wish you a very Happy Birthday!

We appreciate your dedication to fitness and your membership with us. We hope you have a wonderful day celebrating with family and friends.

Best regards,
Viking Hammer CrossFit Team
templates.casual:
Hey {{firstName}}! üéâ

It's your special day! Hope you're ready to celebrate with some epic workouts and birthday gains! üí™

Thanks for being awesome and part of our gym family. Have the best birthday ever!

Cheers! ü•≥
Your Viking Hammer Crew
templates.motivational:
Happy Birthday {{firstName}}! üèÜ

Another year stronger, another year more amazing! Your dedication to fitness inspires us all.

May this new year bring you even more personal records, achievements, and fitness goals conquered!

Keep crushing it! üí™üî•

- Viking Hammer CrossFit
